Description: overtraveling of the movement range (ref_ok is set
to 0 when the range is overtraveled).
Get exclusive access to access channel.
Value 1: Use exclusive access for access channel
Value 0: Access channel is not used exclusively
Value 1: Access channel is used exclusively
Value 0: Allow control via other access channels
Value 1: Lock control via other access channels
The access channel is used by the fieldbus.
In this case, control via the commissioning
software, for example, is not possible.
The access channel can only be locked after the
currently active operating mode has terminated.
